page.title: 19My Favourite Computer Game
page.content: My favourite game is Blockbuster. It is an exciting game with a lot of different screens. There is Buster, the rabbit, who has to jump on all of the squares to change the colour. There is a fox who tries to stop Buster from jumping on all the squares and there is a monkey who jumps all the way down the screen leaving a trail of footprints. You then have to jump on the footprints to clear the screen. After 4 different screens you have to jump twice on each square to change the colour twice. There is now a squirrel who jumps on the squares and changes them back to their original colour. So it gets more hectic as you go along. - Suzanne -
